title: Definition and basic properties of monoids
content: According to Wikipedia ("Monoid", ~ https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Monoid , 6-Feb-2020,) "In abstract algebra [[...] a _monoid_ is an algebraic structure with a single associative binary operation and an identity element. Monoids are semigroups with identity.". In the following, monoids are defined in the second way (as semigroups with identity), see ~ df-mnd , whereas many authors define magmas in the first way (as algebraic structure with a single associative binary operation and an identity element, i.e. without the need of a definition for/knowledge about semigroups), see ~ ismnd . See, for example, the definition in [Lang] p. 3: "A _monoid_ is a set G, with a law of composition which is associative, and having a unit element".

df-mnd
blocks.content: A _monoid_ is a semigroup, which has a two-sided neutral element. Definition 2 in [BourbakiAlg1] p. 12. In other words (according to the definition in [Lang] p. 3), a monoid is a set equipped with an everywhere defined internal operation (see ~ mndcl ), whose operation is associative (see ~ mndass ) and has a two-sided neutral element (see ~ mndid ), see also ~ ismnd . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.) (Revised by AV, 1-Feb-2020.)

axiom df-mnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cmnd, crab(s0, csgrp, wsbc(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), wsbc(s2, cfv(cplusg, cv(s0)), wrex(s3, cv(s1), wral(s4, cv(s1), wa(wceq(co(cv(s3), cv(s2), cv(s4)), cv(s4)), wceq(co(cv(s4), cv(s2), cv(s3)), cv(s4)))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
}

axiom df-mnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ Mnd = { s0 ‚àà SGrp |[(Base ` s0)/ s1][(+ ` s0)/ s2]‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà s1, ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà s1,((s3[s2]s4)= s4 ‚àß(s4[s2]s3)= s4)))}
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
}

  fvex(cbs, cv(hs2))
  fvex(cplusg, cv(hs2))

  raleqbidv(s1, cv(hs1), c1, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), cv(hs0), cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))

thm ismnddef(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà SGrp ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1)))))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  elrab2(hs2, c0, cmnd, csgrp, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1))), [(Base ` hs2)/ hs1][(+ ` hs2)/ hs0]‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà hs1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs1,((s0[hs0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[hs0]s0)= s1))))
  sbc2iedv(hs1, hs0, (Base ` hs2), (+ ` hs2), hs2 = c0, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà hs1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs1,((s0[hs0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[hs0]s0)= s1))), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1))))
  fvex(cbs, hs2)
  fvex(cplusg, hs2)
  syl6bi(hs2 = c0, (hs1 =(Base ` hs2)‚àß hs0 =(+ ` hs2)), (‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà hs1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs1,((s0[hs0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[hs0]s0)= s1)))‚Üî ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1)))), (hs1 = c1 ‚àß hs0 = c2))
  anbi12d(hs2 = c0, hs1 =(Base ` hs2), hs0 =(+ ` hs2), hs1 = c1, hs0 = c2)
  eqeq2d(hs1, (Base ` hs2), c1, hs2 = c0)
  syl6eqr((Base ` hs2), c1, (Base ` c0), hs2 = c0)
  fveq2(hs2, c0, cbs)
  eqeq2d(hs0, (+ ` hs2), c2, hs2 = c0)
  syl6eqr((+ ` hs2), c2, (+ ` c0), hs2 = c0)
  fveq2(hs2, c0, cplusg)
  rexeqbidv(s0, hs1, c1, (hs1 = c1 ‚àß hs0 = c2), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà hs1,((s0[hs0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[hs0]s0)= s1)), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1)))
  raleqbidv(s1, hs1, c1, (hs1 = c1 ‚àß hs0 = c2), ((s0[hs0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[hs0]s0)= s1), ((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1))
  simpl(hs1 = c1, hs0 = c2)
  adantl(hs1 = c1, hs0 = c2, (((s0[hs0]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[hs0]s0)= s1)‚Üî((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1)))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c2, (s0[hs0]s1)= s1, (s1[hs0]s0)= s1, (s0[c2]s1)= s1, (s1[c2]s0)= s1)
  eqeq1d((s0[hs0]s1), s1, (s0[c2]s1), hs0 = c2)
  oveq(hs0, c2, s0, s1)
  eqeq1d((s1[hs0]s0), s1, (s1[c2]s0), hs0 = c2)
  oveq(hs0, c2, s1, s0)
  df-mnd(hs2, hs1, hs0, s0, s1)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(csgrp)
  diff.hs2.w(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1))))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` hs2))
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` hs2))
  diff.hs0.c((+ ` hs2))
  diff.hs1.w(hs2 = c0)
  diff.hs1.w(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1))))
  diff.hs0.w(hs2 = c0)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs1 = c1, hs0 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, hs1 = c1, hs0 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: ismnd
blocks.content: The predicate "is a monoid". This is the definig theorem of a monoid by showing that a set is a monoid if and only if it is a set equipped with a closed, everywhere defined internal operation (so, a magma, see ~ mndcl ), whose operation is associative (so, a semigroup, see also ~ mndass ) and has a two-sided neutral element (see ~ mndid ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.) (Revised by AV, 1-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ismnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wcel(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1), wral(s2, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))))), wrex(s3, c1, wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s3), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s3)), cv(s0)))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
} = {
  bitri(wcel(c0, cmnd), wa(wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wcel(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1), wral(s2, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))))), wrex(s3, c1, wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s3), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s3)), cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(c0, csgrp), wrex(s3, c1, wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s3), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s3)), cv(s0)))))))
  ismnddef(s3, s0, c0, c1, c2)
  pm5.32ri(wcel(c0, csgrp), wrex(s3, c1, wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s3), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s3)), cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wcel(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1), wral(s2, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2)))))))))
  3syl(wrex(s3, c1, wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s3), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s3)), cv(s0))))), wb(wcel(c0, csgrp), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wcel(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c1), wral(s2, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c2, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c2, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))))))))), wne(c1, emptycls), wcel(c0, universe))
  rexn0(s3, c1, wral(s0, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s3), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s3)), cv(s0)))))
  necon1ai(c1, emptycls, wcel(c0, universe))
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, cfv(cbs, c0), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fvprc(c0, cbs)
  issgrpv(s0, s1, s2, c0, universe, c1, c2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
}

thm ismnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚Üî(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2))))))‚àß ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,((s3[c2]s0)= s0 ‚àß(s0[c2]s3)= s0)))))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c2)
} = {
  bitri(c0 ‚àà Mnd, (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2))))))‚àß ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,((s3[c2]s0)= s0 ‚àß(s0[c2]s3)= s0)))), (c0 ‚àà SGrp ‚àß ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,((s3[c2]s0)= s0 ‚àß(s0[c2]s3)= s0)))))
  ismnddef(s3, s0, c0, c1, c2)
  pm5.32ri(c0 ‚àà SGrp, ‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,((s3[c2]s0)= s0 ‚àß(s0[c2]s3)= s0))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2)))))))
  3syl(‚àÉ(s3 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,((s3[c2]s0)= s0 ‚àß(s0[c2]s3)= s0))), (c0 ‚àà SGrp ‚Üî ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)[c2]s2)=(s0[c2](s1[c2]s2))))))), c1 ‚â† ‚àÖ, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  rexn0(s3, c1, ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c1,((s3[c2]s0)= s0 ‚àß(s0[c2]s3)= s0)))
  necon1ai(c1, emptycls, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, (Base ` c0), ¬¨ c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c0, cbs)
  issgrpv(s0, s1, s2, c0, universe, c1, c2)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
}

blocks.name: isnmnd
blocks.content: A condition for a structure not to be a monoid: every element of the base set is not a left identity for at least one element of the base set. (Contributed by AV, 4-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm isnmnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wnel(c2, cmnd))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wnel(c2, cmnd)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wnel(c2, cmnd)), diffsc(s1, c2))
  sylibr(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wnel(c2, cmnd), wn(wcel(c2, cmnd)))
  sylnibr(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wcel(c2, cmnd), wa(wcel(c2, csgrp), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))
  intnand(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wcel(c2, csgrp), wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  sylib(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))), wn(wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wn(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))
  ralimi(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1))), wrex(s1, c0, wn(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  reximi(s1, c0, wne(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wn(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
  intnanrd(wne(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))
  neneq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1))
  bitri(wral(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wn(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), wn(wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), wral(s0, c0, wn(wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))))
  ralbii(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wn(wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wn(wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  rexnal(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))
  ralnex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
  ismnddef(s0, s1, c2, c0, c1)
  df-nel(c2, cmnd)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isnmnd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0[c1]s1)‚â† s1))‚Üí c2 ‚àâ Mnd)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(Base ` c2)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(+ ` c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0[c1]s1)‚â† s1))‚Üí c2 ‚àâ Mnd), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii((‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0[c1]s1)‚â† s1))‚Üí c2 ‚àâ Mnd), d(s1, c2))
  sylibr(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0[c1]s1)‚â† s1)), c2 ‚àâ Mnd, ¬¨ c2 ‚àà Mnd)
  sylnibr(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0[c1]s1)‚â† s1)), c2 ‚àà Mnd, (c2 ‚àà SGrp ‚àß ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,((s0[c1]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c1]s0)= s1)))))
  intnand(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0[c1]s1)‚â† s1)), c2 ‚àà SGrp, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,((s0[c1]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c1]s0)= s1))))
  sylib(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0[c1]s1)‚â† s1)), ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,((s0[c1]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c1]s0)= s1))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, ¬¨((s0[c1]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c1]s0)= s1))))
  ralimi(s0, c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0,(s0[c1]s1)‚â† s1), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, ¬¨((s0[c1]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c1]s0)= s1)))
  reximi(s1, c0, (s0[c1]s1)‚â† s1, ¬¨((s0[c1]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c1]s0)= s1))
  intnanrd((s0[c1]s1)‚â† s1, (s0[c1]s1)= s1, (s1[c1]s0)= s1)
  neneq((s0[c1]s1), s1)
  bitri(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, ¬¨((s0[c1]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c1]s0)= s1))), ¬¨ ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,((s0[c1]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c1]s0)= s1))), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,((s0[c1]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c1]s0)= s1))))
  ralbii(s0, c0, ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c0, ¬¨((s0[c1]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c1]s0)= s1)), ¬¨ ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,((s0[c1]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c1]s0)= s1)))
  rexnal(s1, c0, ((s0[c1]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c1]s0)= s1))
  ralnex(s0, c0, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c0,((s0[c1]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c1]s0)= s1)))
  ismnddef(s0, s1, c2, c0, c1)
  df-nel(c2, cmnd)
}

blocks.name: mndsgrp
blocks.content: A monoid is a semigroup. (Contributed by FL, 2-Nov-2009.) (Revised by AV, 6-Jan-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 6-Feb-2020.)

blocks.name: mndmgm
blocks.content: A monoid is a magma. (Contributed by FL, 2-Nov-2009.) (Revised by AV, 6-Jan-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 6-Feb-2020.)

blocks.name: mndcl

blocks.name: mndass

blocks.name: mndid
blocks.content: A monoid has a two-sided identity element. (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm mndid(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cmnd), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, cmnd), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  simprbi(wcel(c0, cmnd), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wral(s1, c1, wral(hs0, c1, wa(wcel(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0)), c1), wral(hs1, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(hs0)), c2, cv(hs1)), co(cv(s1), c2, co(cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1)))))))))
  ismnd(s1, hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
}

thm mndid(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1))))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c0)

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {

  simprbi(c0 ‚àà Mnd, ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1))), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà c1,((s1[c2]hs0)‚àà c1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà c1,((s1[c2]hs0)[c2]hs1)=(s1[c2](hs0[c2]hs1)))))))
  ismnd(s1, hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)

blocks.name: mndideu
blocks.content: The two-sided identity element of a monoid is unique. Lemma 2.2.1(a) of [Herstein] p. 55. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mndideu(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cmnd), wreu(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  sylanblrc(wcel(c0, cmnd), wreu(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wrex(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))), wrmo(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))))))
  mndid(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  mgmidmo(s0, s1, c1, c2)
  reu5(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))))
}

thm mndideu(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚Üí ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1))))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(+ ` c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  sylanblrc(c0 ‚àà Mnd, ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1))), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1))), ‚àÉ*(s0 ‚àà c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1))))
  mndid(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2)
  mgmidmo(s0, s1, c1, c2)
  reu5(s0, c1, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1,((s0[c2]s1)= s1 ‚àß(s1[c2]s0)= s1)))
}

blocks.name: mnd32g
blocks.content: Commutative/associative law for monoids, with an explicit commutativity hypothesis. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm mnd32g(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, c3), co(co(c0, c1, c3), c1, c2)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c2, c1, c3), co(c3, c1, c2)))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, c3), co(co(c0, c1, c3), c1, c2), co(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, c3)), co(c0, c1, co(c3, c1, c2)), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, c3), co(c3, c1, c2), w0)
  syl13anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, c3), co(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, c3))), wcel(c5, cmnd), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  mndass(c5, c0, c4, c2, c3, c1)
  syl13anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c3), c1, c2), co(c0, c1, co(c3, c1, c2))), wcel(c5, cmnd), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c2, c4))
  mndass(c5, c0, c4, c3, c2, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mnd32g(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0[c1]c2)[c1]c3)=((c0[c1]c3)[c1]c2))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(+ ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà Mnd)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c2[c1]c3)=(c3[c1]c2))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(((c0[c1]c2)[c1]c3), ((c0[c1]c3)[c1]c2), (c0[c1](c2[c1]c3)), (c0[c1](c3[c1]c2)), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, c1, (c2[c1]c3), (c3[c1]c2), w0)
  syl13anc(w0, ((c0[c1]c2)[c1]c3)=(c0[c1](c2[c1]c3)), c5 ‚àà Mnd, c0 ‚àà c4, c2 ‚àà c4, c3 ‚àà c4)
  mndass(c5, c0, c4, c2, c3, c1)
  syl13anc(w0, ((c0[c1]c3)[c1]c2)=(c0[c1](c3[c1]c2)), c5 ‚àà Mnd, c0 ‚àà c4, c3 ‚àà c4, c2 ‚àà c4)
  mndass(c5, c0, c4, c3, c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: mnd12g
blocks.content: Commutative/associative law for monoids, with an explicit commutativity hypothesis. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm mnd12g(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, c3)), co(c2, c1, co(c0, c1, c3))))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c2, c1, c0)))
} = {
  3eqtr3d(co(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, c3)), co(c2, c1, co(c0, c1, c3)), co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, c3), co(co(c2, c1, c0), c1, c3), w0)
  oveq1d(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, c3, co(c2, c1, c0), w0)
  syl13anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, c3), co(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, c3))), wcel(c5, cmnd), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  mndass(c5, c0, c4, c2, c3, c1)
  syl13anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c2, c1, c0), c1, c3), co(c2, c1, co(c0, c1, c3))), wcel(c5, cmnd), wcel(c2, c4), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  mndass(c5, c2, c4, c0, c3, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mnd12g(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[c1](c2[c1]c3))=(c2[c1](c0[c1]c3)))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(+ ` c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà Mnd)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[c1]c2)=(c2[c1]c0))
} = {
  3eqtr3d((c0[c1](c2[c1]c3)), (c2[c1](c0[c1]c3)), ((c0[c1]c2)[c1]c3), ((c2[c1]c0)[c1]c3), w0)
  oveq1d((c0[c1]c2), c1, c3, (c2[c1]c0), w0)
  syl13anc(w0, ((c0[c1]c2)[c1]c3)=(c0[c1](c2[c1]c3)), c5 ‚àà Mnd, c0 ‚àà c4, c2 ‚àà c4, c3 ‚àà c4)
  mndass(c5, c0, c4, c2, c3, c1)
  syl13anc(w0, ((c2[c1]c0)[c1]c3)=(c2[c1](c0[c1]c3)), c5 ‚àà Mnd, c2 ‚àà c4, c0 ‚àà c4, c3 ‚àà c4)
  mndass(c5, c2, c4, c0, c3, c1)
}

blocks.name: mnd4g
blocks.content: Commutative/associative law for commutative monoids, with an explicit commutativity hypothesis. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm mnd4g(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, co(c3, c1, c4)), co(co(c0, c1, c3), c1, co(c2, c1, c4))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, cmnd))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c2, c1, c3), co(c3, c1, c2)))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, co(c3, c1, c4)), co(co(c0, c1, c3), c1, co(c2, c1, c4)), co(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, co(c3, c1, c4))), co(c0, c1, co(c3, c1, co(c2, c1, c4))), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, co(c3, c1, c4)), co(c3, c1, co(c2, c1, c4)), w0)
  mnd12g(c2, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  syl13anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, co(c3, c1, c4)), co(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, co(c3, c1, c4)))), wcel(c6, cmnd), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5), wcel(co(c3, c1, c4), c5))
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c3, c1, c4), c5), wcel(c6, cmnd), wcel(c3, c5), wcel(c4, c5))
  mndcl(c6, c3, c5, c4, c1)
  mndass(c6, c0, c5, c2, co(c3, c1, c4), c1)
  syl13anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c3), c1, co(c2, c1, c4)), co(c0, c1, co(c3, c1, co(c2, c1, c4)))), wcel(c6, cmnd), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c3, c5), wcel(co(c2, c1, c4), c5))
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c2, c1, c4), c5), wcel(c6, cmnd), wcel(c2, c5), wcel(c4, c5))
  mndcl(c6, c2, c5, c4, c1)
  mndass(c6, c0, c5, c3, co(c2, c1, c4), c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mnd4g(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0[c1]c2)[c1](c3[c1]c4))=((c0[c1]c3)[c1](c2[c1]c4)))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(+ ` c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c6 ‚àà Mnd)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c2[c1]c3)=(c3[c1]c2))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(((c0[c1]c2)[c1](c3[c1]c4)), ((c0[c1]c3)[c1](c2[c1]c4)), (c0[c1](c2[c1](c3[c1]c4))), (c0[c1](c3[c1](c2[c1]c4))), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, c1, (c2[c1](c3[c1]c4)), (c3[c1](c2[c1]c4)), w0)
  mnd12g(c2, c1, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  syl13anc(w0, ((c0[c1]c2)[c1](c3[c1]c4))=(c0[c1](c2[c1](c3[c1]c4))), c6 ‚àà Mnd, c0 ‚àà c5, c2 ‚àà c5, (c3[c1]c4)‚àà c5)
  syl3anc(w0, (c3[c1]c4)‚àà c5, c6 ‚àà Mnd, c3 ‚àà c5, c4 ‚àà c5)
  mndcl(c6, c3, c5, c4, c1)
  mndass(c6, c0, c5, c2, (c3[c1]c4), c1)
  syl13anc(w0, ((c0[c1]c3)[c1](c2[c1]c4))=(c0[c1](c3[c1](c2[c1]c4))), c6 ‚àà Mnd, c0 ‚àà c5, c3 ‚àà c5, (c2[c1]c4)‚àà c5)
  syl3anc(w0, (c2[c1]c4)‚àà c5, c6 ‚àà Mnd, c2 ‚àà c5, c4 ‚àà c5)
  mndcl(c6, c2, c5, c4, c1)
  mndass(c6, c0, c5, c3, (c2[c1]c4), c1)
}

blocks.name: mndidcl
blocks.content: The identity element of a monoid belongs to the monoid. (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mndidcl(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  mgmidcl(hs1, hs0, c1, c2, c0, cfv(cplusg, c0), wcel(c0, cmnd))
  mndid(hs1, hs0, c0, c2, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cplusg, c0))
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c2)

  ‚ä£ c1 =(0 ` c0)
} = {

  diff.hs1.s(hs0)

  diff.hs1.c((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((+ ` c0))
}

blocks.name: mndfo
blocks.content: The addition operation of a monoid is an onto function (assuming it is a function). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2013.) (Proof shortened by AV, 23-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm mndfo(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wfn(c1, cxp(c2, c2))), wfo(c1, cxp(c2, c2), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cplusg, c0))
} = {
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wfn(c1, cxp(c2, c2))), wfo(c1, cxp(c2, c2), c2), wfo(cfv(cplusf, c0), cxp(c2, c2), c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cmnd), wfn(c1, cxp(c2, c2)), wfo(cfv(cplusf, c0), cxp(c2, c2), c2))
  mndpfo(c0, cfv(cplusf, c0), c2)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wfn(c1, cxp(c2, c2))), wb(wfo(c1, cxp(c2, c2), c2), wfo(cfv(cplusf, c0), cxp(c2, c2), c2)), wceq(c1, cfv(cplusf, c0)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cmnd), wfn(c1, cxp(c2, c2)), wceq(c1, cfv(cplusf, c0)))
  eqcomd(c1, cfv(cplusf, c0), wfn(c1, cxp(c2, c2)))
  plusfeq(c1, c2, cfv(cplusf, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cplusf, c0))
  foeq1(c1, cfv(cplusf, c0), cxp(c2, c2), c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mndfo(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1[Fn](c2 √ó c2))‚Üí(c1 :(c2 √ó c2)‚Ü† c2))
  ‚ä£ c2 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(+ ` c0)
} = {
  mpbird((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1[Fn](c2 √ó c2)), (c1 :(c2 √ó c2)‚Ü† c2), ((+f ` c0):(c2 √ó c2)‚Ü† c2))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà Mnd, c1[Fn](c2 √ó c2), ((+f ` c0):(c2 √ó c2)‚Ü† c2))
  mndpfo(c0, (+f ` c0), c2)
  syl((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚àß c1[Fn](c2 √ó c2)), ((c1 :(c2 √ó c2)‚Ü† c2)‚Üî((+f ` c0):(c2 √ó c2)‚Ü† c2)), c1 =(+f ` c0))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà Mnd, c1[Fn](c2 √ó c2), c1 =(+f ` c0))
  eqcomd(c1, (+f ` c0), c1[Fn](c2 √ó c2))
  plusfeq(c1, c2, (+f ` c0), c0)
  eqid((+f ` c0))
  foeq1(c1, (+f ` c0), (c2 √ó c2), c2)
}

blocks.name: mndpropd

blocks.name: mndprop
blocks.content: If two structures have the same group components (properties), one is a monoid iff the other one is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm mndprop(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd))
  -| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1))
} = {
  mptru(wb(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)))
  mndpropd(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), wtru)
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c0), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  a1i(wa(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))))
  oveqi(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs1.w(wtru)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mndprop(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚Üî c1 ‚àà Mnd)
  ‚ä£ (Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1)
  ‚ä£ (+ ` c0)=(+ ` c1)
} = {
  mptru((c0 ‚àà Mnd ‚Üî c1 ‚àà Mnd))
  mndpropd(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, (Base ` c0), wtru)
  eqidd((Base ` c0), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, (Base ` c0)=(Base ` c1))
  a1i((T ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà(Base ` c0)‚àß hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c0))), (hs0[(+ ` c0)]hs1)=(hs0[(+ ` c1)]hs1))
  oveqi(hs0, (+ ` c0), hs1, (+ ` c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs1.w(wtru)
}

  mndlid(c0, cv(hs0), c3, c1, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), c1), cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))

blocks.name: submnd0
blocks.content: The zero of a submonoid is the same as the zero in the parent monoid. (Note that we must add the condition that the zero of the parent monoid is actually contained in the submonoid, because it is possible to have "subsets that are monoids" which are not submonoids because they have a different identity element.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm submnd0(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))), wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c1)))

  -| wceq(c4, cfv(c0g, c0))

  ismgmid2(hs0, c4, cfv(c0g, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), c1, cfv(cplusg, c1), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))

  oveqd(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1))))
  syl2an(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wceq(co(c4, cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  mndlid(c0, cv(hs0), c3, c4, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqtr3d(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), c4), cv(hs0), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), c4), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1))))
  oveqd(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), c4, cfv(cplusg, c1), wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1))))
  syl(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1))), wceq(cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1)), wcel(c2, universe))
  adantr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wa(wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(c2, universe))

  ad2antrl(wa(wcel(c0, cmnd), wcel(c1, cmnd)), wss(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c2), wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))

  fvex(cbs, c1)

blocks.name: mnd1
blocks.content: The (smallest) structure representing a _trivial monoid_ consists of one element. (Contributed by AV, 28-Apr-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 11-Feb-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm mnd1(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cmnd))
  -| wceq(c2, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), csn(c0)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)))))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, cmnd), wcel(c2, csgrp), wrex(hs0, csn(c0), wral(hs1, csn(c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))))
  sgrp1(c0, c1, c2)
  mpbird(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(hs0, csn(c0), wral(hs1, csn(c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1))))), wral(hs1, csn(c0), wa(wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cv(hs1)))))
  mpbir2and(wcel(c0, c1), wral(hs1, csn(c0), wa(wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cv(hs1)))), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0))
  syl5eq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0, cfv(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cop(c0, c0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  df-ov(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0)
  mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cop(c0, c0)), c0), wcel(cop(c0, c0), universe))
  opex(c0, c0)
  fvsng(cop(c0, c0), universe, c0, c1)
  ralsng(hs1, c0, c1, wa(wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cv(hs1))), wa(wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0))
  eqeq12d(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0, wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c0, c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(hs1), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cv(hs1), co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0, wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs1), c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0)
  id(wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  rexsng(hs0, c0, c1, wral(hs1, csn(c0), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, csn(c0), wa(wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cv(hs1)))))
  ovanraleqv(hs1, cv(hs0), c0, csn(c0), cv(hs1), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1), wceq(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1), co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1))
  ismnddef(hs0, hs1, c2, csn(c0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)))
  ax-mp(wceq(csn(c0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(csn(c0), universe))
  snex(c0)
  grpbase(csn(c0), universe, c2, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)))
  ax-mp(wceq(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cfv(cplusg, c2)), wcel(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), universe))
  snex(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0))
  grpplusg(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), universe, c2, csn(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wral(hs1, csn(c0), wa(wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs1)), cv(hs1)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)))
  diff.hs1.c(csn(c0))
  diff.hs1.c(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)))
}

blocks.name: mnd1id
blocks.content: The singleton element of a _trivial monoid_ is its identity element. (Contributed by AV, 23-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm mnd1id(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(c0g, c2), c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), csn(c0)), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)))))
} = {
  eqcomd(cfv(c0g, c2), c0, wcel(c0, c1))
  ismgmid2(hs0, c0, cfv(c0g, c2), csn(c0), c2, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  ax-mp(wceq(csn(c0), cfv(cbs, c2)), wcel(csn(c0), universe))
  snex(c0)
  grpbase(csn(c0), universe, c2, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c2))
  ax-mp(wceq(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cfv(cplusg, c2)), wcel(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), universe))
  snex(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0))
  grpplusg(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), universe, c2, csn(c0))
  snidg(c0, c1)
  imp(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))
  syl5bi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0))
  eqeq12d(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)))
  imp(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cv(hs0)))
  syl5bi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  velsn(hs0, c0)
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0))
  syl5eq(co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0, cfv(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cop(c0, c0)), wcel(c0, c1))
  df-ov(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0)
  mpan(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), cop(c0, c0)), c0), wcel(cop(c0, c0), universe))
  opex(c0, c0)
  fvsng(cop(c0, c0), universe, c0, c1)
  eqeq12d(co(cv(hs0), csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), cv(hs0), co(c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0), c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)), c0)
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c0g, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(cop(cop(c0, c0), c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mnd1id(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(0 ` c2)= c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 = { <(Base ` ndx), { c0 } >, <(+ ` ndx), { < < c0, c0 >, c0 > } > }
} = {
  eqcomd((0 ` c2), c0, c0 ‚àà c1)
  ismgmid2(hs0, c0, (0 ` c2), { c0 }, c2, { < < c0, c0 >, c0 > }, c0 ‚àà c1)
  ax-mp({ c0 } =(Base ` c2), { c0 } ‚àà ùïå)
  snex(c0)
  grpbase({ c0 }, universe, c2, { < < c0, c0 >, c0 > })
  eqid((0 ` c2))
  ax-mp({ < < c0, c0 >, c0 > } =(+ ` c2), { < < c0, c0 >, c0 > } ‚àà ùïå)
  snex(< < c0, c0 >, c0 >)
  grpplusg({ < < c0, c0 >, c0 > }, universe, c2, { c0 })
  snidg(c0, c1)
  imp(c0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà { c0 }, (c0[{ < < c0, c0 >, c0 > }]hs0)= hs0)
  syl5bi(c0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà { c0 }, (c0[{ < < c0, c0 >, c0 > }]hs0)= hs0, hs0 = c0)
  syl5ibrcom(c0 ‚àà c1, hs0 = c0, (c0[{ < < c0, c0 >, c0 > }]hs0)= hs0, (c0[{ < < c0, c0 >, c0 > }]c0)= c0)
  eqeq12d((c0[{ < < c0, c0 >, c0 > }]hs0), hs0, (c0[{ < < c0, c0 >, c0 > }]c0), c0, hs0 = c0)
  oveq2(hs0, c0, c0, { < < c0, c0 >, c0 > })
  imp(c0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà { c0 }, (hs0[{ < < c0, c0 >, c0 > }]c0)= hs0)
  syl5bi(c0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà { c0 }, (hs0[{ < < c0, c0 >, c0 > }]c0)= hs0, hs0 = c0)
  velsn(hs0, c0)
  syl5ibrcom(c0 ‚àà c1, hs0 = c0, (hs0[{ < < c0, c0 >, c0 > }]c0)= hs0, (c0[{ < < c0, c0 >, c0 > }]c0)= c0)
  syl5eq((c0[{ < < c0, c0 >, c0 > }]c0), c0, ({ < < c0, c0 >, c0 > } ` < c0, c0 >), c0 ‚àà c1)
  df-ov(c0, { < < c0, c0 >, c0 > }, c0)
  mpan(c0 ‚àà c1, ({ < < c0, c0 >, c0 > } ` < c0, c0 >)= c0, < c0, c0 > ‚àà ùïå)
  opex(c0, c0)
  fvsng(< c0, c0 >, universe, c0, c1)
  eqeq12d((hs0[{ < < c0, c0 >, c0 > }]c0), hs0, (c0[{ < < c0, c0 >, c0 > }]c0), c0, hs0 = c0)
  oveq1(hs0, c0, { < < c0, c0 >, c0 > }, c0)
  id(hs0 = c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((0 ` c2))
  diff.hs0.c({ c0 })
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c({ < < c0, c0 >, c0 > })
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà c1)
}
